odb.steps.values()[-1].frames[-1].fieldOutputs['S'].values[-1].localCoordSystem
#attempting to extract the rotation matrix of the last gauss point of the last frame.

In [17]: np.linalg.det(UVARM)
Out[17]: 1.000000010110752
